description:
Do you want to lead a book study and need a simple format? Book studies are an easy and inexpensive way to help develop your managers. The objective of this course is to help managers create successful book studies.

You will learn:

    ·How to select reading materials

    ·Develop outlines

    ·Create study guide questions

This course is simple and you can learn at your own pace. This system was developed for creating a book study which has proved successful for me. Learning to read a book and apply it's concepts to your work environment is key in leading a successful book study.
title: Develop Your Managers Using Book Studies
